summary: This simple mod adds a complete craftable/enchantable set of Nightingale armor, blade and bow.
descriptionHtml:
Sunnie\'s Craftable & Enchantable Nightingale Set


Version: v1.0 (Jan 3, 2012)
-Release

Version 1.1 (Jan 5, 2012)
-Fixed issue where items can\'t be improved if enchanted first.
-Added missing \",Void\" descriptor to the NG blade name (for consitency).
-This updated esp will retroactivly fix pre-existing crafted NG items.

Optional 1.1 (Jan 11, 2012)
-Patch file that adds this set to the Ebony material list. Requires the main mod.

What: This simple mod adds a complete set of Nightingale armor, blade and bow. They are all obtained through smithing, and though they require no skill perks to craft, they do require higher end resources to make. All are able to be improved and all are enchantable. 


To install: Unpack and drop the Sunnie_NG_Set.esp into Skyrim\'s data folder (?\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\). Activate mod with a mod manager or the games launcher.

To Update from 1.0: From the v1.1 zip, unpack and drop the Sunnie_NG_Set.esp into Skyrim\'s data folder (?\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\), overwriting the the original.

To uninstall: Delete Sunnie_NG_Set.esp from the Skyrim data folder (?\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\).




Conflicts: None, this is a completely new set or armor, weapons, and recipes, they will not interfere with any vanilla replacers. 
Any retexture or modification of the normal Nightingale meshes will also show on this set. 


Permissions: You can not use this mod or any part of it in another mod without permission. This mod can not be uploaded to any server or host 

site not authorized by the author. At the time of publish, the only authorized site/host is The Skyrim Nexus Site (e.g. skyrimnexus.com).
author: Sunnie
